typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@Cliente_ID == source2@Cliente_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
